verses.verse: It happened after <S%H310><s%> these things, <S%H1697><s%> that the butler <S%H8248><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and his baker <S%H644><s%> offended <S%H2398><s%> their lord, <S%H113><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> was angry <S%H7107><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> his two <S%H8147><s%> officers, <S%H5631><s%> the chief <S%H8269><s%> cupbearer <S%H8248><s%> and the chief <S%H8269><s%> baker. <S%H644><s%>

He put <S%H5414><s%> them in custody <S%H4929><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the captain <S%H8269><s%> of the guard, <S%H2876><s%> into the prison, <S%H1004><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> where Joseph <S%H3130><s%> was bound. <S%H631><s%>

The captain <S%H8269><s%> of the guard <S%H2876><s%> assigned <S%H6485><s%> them to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and he took care <S%H8334><s%> of them. <S%H4929><s%> They stayed in prison many days. <S%H3117><s%>

They both <S%H8147><s%> dreamed <S%H2492><s%> a dream, <S%H2472><s%> each man <S%H376><s%> his dream, <S%H2472><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> night, <S%H3915><s%> each man <S%H376><s%> according to the interpretation <S%H6623><s%> of his dream, <S%H2472><s%> the cupbearer <S%H8248><s%> and the baker <S%H644><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> who were bound <S%H631><s%> in the prison. <S%H1004><s%>
Joseph <S%H3130><s%> came in <S%H935><s%> to them in <S%H935><s%> the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and saw them, <S%H2196><s%> and saw that they were sad.

He asked <S%H7592><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s officers <S%H5631><s%> who were with him in custody <S%H4929><s%> in his master <S%H113><s%>'s house, <S%H1004><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Why do you look <S%H6440><s%> so sad <S%H7451><s%> today? <S%H3117><s%>"

They said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H2492><s%> "We have dreamed a dream, <S%H2472><s%> and there is no one who can interpret <S%H6622><s%> it. <S%H3130><s%>" Joseph said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H6623><s%> "Don't interpretations belong to God? <S%H430><s%> Please tell it to me. <S%H5608><s%>"

The chief <S%H8269><s%> cupbearer <S%H8248><s%> told <S%H5608><s%> his dream <S%H2472><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H2472><s%> "In my dream, behold, <S%H1612><s%> a vine was in front of me, <S%H6440><s%>

and in the vine <S%H1612><s%> were three <S%H7969><s%> branches. <S%H8299><s%> It was as though it budded, <S%H6524><s%> it blossomed, <S%H5322><s%> and its clusters <S%H811><s%> produced <S%H5927><s%> ripe <S%H1310><s%> grapes. <S%H6025><s%>

Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s cup <S%H3563><s%> was in my hand; <S%H3027><s%> and I took <S%H3947><s%> the grapes, <S%H6025><s%> and pressed <S%H7818><s%> them into Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s cup, <S%H3563><s%> and I gave <S%H5414><s%> the cup <S%H3563><s%> into Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s hand. <S%H3709><s%>"
Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H6623><s%> "This is its interpretation: the three <S%H7969><s%> branches <S%H8299><s%> are three <S%H7969><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

Within <S%H5750><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> more days, <S%H3117><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> will lift up <S%H5375><s%> your head, <S%H7218><s%> and restore <S%H7725><s%> you to your office. <S%H3653><s%> You will give <S%H5414><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s cup <S%H3563><s%> into his hand, <S%H3027><s%> the way <S%H4941><s%> you did when you were <S%H7223><s%> his cupbearer. <S%H8248><s%>

But remember <S%H2142><s%> me when it will be well <S%H3190><s%> with you, <S%H6213><s%> and please show kindness <S%H2617><s%> to me, <S%H2142><s%> and make mention of me to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and bring me <S%H3318><s%> out of this house. <S%H1004><s%>

For indeed, <S%H1589><s%> I was stolen away out of the land <S%H776><s%> of the Hebrews, <S%H5680><s%> and here also have I done <S%H6213><s%> nothing <S%H3972><s%> that they should put <S%H7760><s%> me into the dungeon. <S%H953><s%>"

When the chief <S%H8269><s%> baker <S%H644><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that the interpretation <S%H6622><s%> was good, <S%H2896><s%> he said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> "I also <S%H637><s%> was in my dream, <S%H2472><s%> and behold, <S%H7969><s%> three baskets <S%H5536><s%> of white <S%H2751><s%> bread were on my head. <S%H7218><s%>

In the uppermost <S%H5945><s%> basket <S%H5536><s%> there was all kinds <S%H3978><s%> of baked food <S%H4639><s%> for Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and the birds <S%H5775><s%> ate <S%H398><s%> them out of the basket <S%H5536><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> my head. <S%H7218><s%>"
Joseph <S%H3130><s%> answered, <S%H6030><s%> "This <S%H559><s%> is its interpretation. <S%H6623><s%> The three <S%H7969><s%> baskets <S%H5536><s%> are three <S%H7969><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

Within three <S%H7969><s%> more days, <S%H3117><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> will lift up <S%H5375><s%> your head <S%H7218><s%> from off you, <S%H8518><s%> and will hang you on a tree; <S%H6086><s%> and the birds <S%H5775><s%> will eat <S%H398><s%> your flesh from off you. <S%H1320><s%>"

It happened the third <S%H7992><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> which was Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s birthday, <S%H3117><s%> that he made <S%H6213><s%> a feast <S%H4960><s%> for all his servants, <S%H5650><s%> and he lifted up <S%H5375><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%> of the chief <S%H8269><s%> cupbearer <S%H8248><s%> and the head of the chief <S%H8269><s%> baker <S%H644><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> his servants. <S%H5650><s%>

He restored <S%H7725><s%> the chief <S%H8269><s%> cupbearer <S%H8248><s%> to his position <S%H4945><s%> again, <S%H7725><s%> and he gave <S%H5414><s%> the cup <S%H3563><s%> into Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s hand; <S%H3709><s%>
but he hanged <S%H8518><s%> the chief <S%H8269><s%> baker, <S%H644><s%> as Joseph <S%H3130><s%> had interpreted to them. <S%H6622><s%>
Yet the chief <S%H8269><s%> cupbearer <S%H8248><s%> didn't <S%H2142><s%> remember Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> but forgot him. <S%H7911><s%>
